alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 25 at 6:43PM CST until December 26 at 12:57AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Rockwall and Hunt Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River near Quinlan. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CST Monday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 4.7 feet Saturday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
